programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington & The Tooth Fairy / Paddington Goes to Work) S2 (12/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington & The Tooth Fairy / Paddington Goes to Work»Judy loses a tooth quite literally- Will it be found in time for bed and will the tooth fairy like marmalade? // Paddington becomes a work bear and helps Mr. Brown in the home office but learns computers can be tricky things.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddingtons New Neighbour / Paddington Makes the News) S2 (13/27)
programme.desc: «Paddingtons New Neighbour / Paddington Makes the News»The Browns have new neighbors & Toq is full of tales like there's a goblin in the garden and her dad is an astronaut! They can't be true, can they? // Paddington, Jonathan & Judy decide to create a newspaper but they need a front page story!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le cochon du milieu) S1 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Le cochon du milieu»Peppa loses her tooth, so she puts the tooth under the pillow for the Tooth Fairy, but she worries that she might be mean.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Papa Pig a perdu ses lunettes) S1 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Papa Pig a perdu ses lunettes»Papa Pig is a bit cranky because he lost his glasses. Peppa and George are going to look for him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le jardinage) S1 (10/52)
programme.desc: «Le jardinage»Daddy Loses His Glasses: When Daddy Pig loses his glasses he gets a bit grumpy. But Peppa and George have lots of fun looking for them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le hoquet) S1 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Le hoquet»George gets hiccups when he drinks his juice too quickly, so Peppa tries to cure him.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Les Secouristes à la rescousse !) S6 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Les Secouristes à la rescousse !»In Ancient Greece, Paramedics Zooli and Gil get a call for help from Nonny, so they fly toward him in their chariot ambulance! But on the way, they're pursued by a giant Cyclops! Will they help Nonny before the Cyclops catches up to them?

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue au pays des dinosaures) S3 (6/18)
programme.desc: «Blue au pays des dinosaures»Blue's Dino Clues: It's a prehistoric game of Blue's Clues when a mysterious dinosaur egg falls out of the Skidoo Frame and starts to hatch! (S3, ep 2).

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (No Time Like the Present Store) S3 (n°3)
programme.desc: «No Time Like the Present Store»At the Present Store, Joe's running a contest, whoever guesses the mystery present gets to unwrap it! What could be inside this special gift?! We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (La longue-vue magique / La pierre de la vie) S1 (2/21)
programme.desc: «La longue-vue magique / La pierre de la vie»Santi and crew are after the legendary Magic Spyglass! But things get tricky when Enrique Real de Palacios III joins the chase. / Santi and crew follow a map to a special treasure, but Bonnie and Sir Butterscotch are hot on their trail.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Hiccup Soup) S2 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Hiccup Soup»Follow the adventures of 8-year-old Santiago Montes, a brave and kind-hearted pirate, and features a Spanish-language and Latino-Caribbean culture curriculum.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Amis pour la vie / La Poulpicelle) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Amis pour la vie / La Poulpicelle»When Baby Shark and friends enter a battle of the bands, Baby's rivalry with Shadow gets heated.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (William Manta: News Fish) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «William Manta: News Fish»William Manta - News Fish: While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter. (S1, ep 18a).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Cranberry Cookies) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Cranberry Cookies»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le réveil du Géant-Panzé / L'oeuf de Galinetta) S6 (8/26)
programme.desc: «Le réveil du Géant-Panzé / L'oeuf de Galinetta»The Turbots are trapped somewhere in the jungle. They tried to call the Paw Patrol, but their phone cut out! // Chickaletta has laid an egg, but it's rolled away and is heading through town. The Paw Patrol has to catch it before it breaks.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Builds a Scarecrow) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Paddington Builds a Scarecrow»A brand new version of a most familiar bear! A heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le train de Papy Pig à la rescousse !) S4 (20/52)
programme.desc: «Le train de Papy Pig à la rescousse !»Miss Rabbit's train has broken down, so Grandpa Pig lends her his toy train, Trudy.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le concours d'animaux) S4 (21/52)
programme.desc: «Le concours d'animaux»There is a pet competition at playgroup, and everyone has brought in their pets. Dr Hamster is the judge, but finds it hard to choose the best pet.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La toile d'araignée) S4 (22/52)
programme.desc: «La toile d'araignée»Peppa, George and Mummy Pig are in Daddy Pig's study, and they see that it is a complete mess and full of spider webs. They see a spider, which Peppa names Mister Skinnylegs, but Mummy Pig is afraid and tells Daddy Pig to get rid of it. They set out to find a new home for Mister Skinnylegs.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Backwards Day) S1 (61/78)
programme.desc: «Backwards Day»Backwards Ron Day: Anna and Froga forgot that today is Ron's Day. There's nothing to eat and Christopher is missing! But, in the rush, everything is going wrong. (S1, ep 61).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Stuck) S1 (n°62)
programme.desc: «Stuck»Froga has made Christopher a homemade helmet in watermelon, with ear holes for his stuffed animal Geegee - but when Froga hand gets stuck inside one of the holes, it's an adventure trying to release her.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Le nouveau voisin de Blue) S3 (1/18)
programme.desc: «Le nouveau voisin de Blue»Josh and Blue have some big news - a new neighbour just moved in next door and it's...Periwinkle! We play Blue's Clues to figure out how to help Periwinkle feel welcome.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat' Patrouille sauve un lamantin / Un petit-déjeuner mouvementé) S6 (10/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat' Patrouille sauve un lamantin / Un petit-déjeuner mouvementé»Farmer Al and Farmer Yumi need help from the PAW Patrol to a get a manatee to the swamp. // Mr. Porter and Alex are in a sticky situation - they're up to their ears in maple syrup! It's up to the PAW Patrol to save the Porter's and Breakfast!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Surprise) S2 (18/26)
programme.desc: «Surprise»It seems like a regular day in Adventure Bay as the Paw Patrol is called to duty. But the pups are in for a surprise - PAW Patrol Appreciation Day!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Bonsoir, Platino-ville / Métalzilla) S1 (1/20)
programme.desc: «Bonsoir, Platino-ville / Métalzilla»Mr. Steel does not want to get out of bed and has Professor Sketch build a gigantic pair of sunglasses to block the sun. During a parade, Mr. Steel inflates his balloon in such a way that it disrupts the entire city.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (L'Échangeur / Touche pas à mon oeuf) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «L'Échangeur / Touche pas à mon oeuf»Professor Scratch's Switcheroo device causes chaos when Sir Steel uses it to get Deer Squad's Powers. // Rammy must learn to trust his friends when he chooses to take care of an abandoned egg, all while dealing with a mysterious ant invasion.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Shares A Good Deed / Paddington Goes Green) S2 (14/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Shares A Good Deed / Paddington Goes Green»Paddington Shares A Good Deed: Mr. Gruber does a good turn for Paddington and says he can thank him by passing it on to someone else, which is harder than it sounds! (S2, ep 14a).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Pancakes) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Pancakes»Pancakes: Tiny Chef makes pancakes but loses his confidence when he breaks his special lucky pancake flipping spatula. (S1, ep 4a).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbibul a un secret / Trop trop la classe) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Barbibul a un secret / Trop trop la classe»Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out. // The Barbapapa decide to save energy. But their efforts are undermined by Barbabright and Barbabelle who build a secret energy-consuming project.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Bababam / Les barbamartiens) S1 (2/52)
programme.desc: «Bababam / Les barbamartiens»Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le mot de passe secret / La partie du lundi) S2 (3/11)
programme.desc: «Le mot de passe secret / La partie du lundi»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le gobelin farceur) S2 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Le gobelin farceur»Goldie's reputation as a great party hostess is on the line when she forgets to buy treats for her guests.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Go Find it!) S1 (n°58)
programme.desc: «Go Find it!»Go Find It!: Today, Christopher organises the game of the day. He lists objects that his friends must bring back, and the first team who does will win the game. (S1, ep 58).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Echange de rôles) S1 (63/78)
programme.desc: «Echange de rôles»Switcheroo: When Froga and Anna realize they have switched mugs in the morning, they decide to make a day out of it and Switcheroo Day is born.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (King for a Day) S1 (n°41)
programme.desc: «King for a Day»Today the friends play King For A Day, someone throws the crown on Christopher's head! Then the crown leaves his head and ends on his cousin, Benjy, who just came for a day visit. Benjy only wants to play with his cousin, and do whatever he wants.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Vegetable Pie) S1 (42/78)
programme.desc: «The Vegetable Pie»Froga's strawberries are sick so she's going to miss this year's vegetable picking. When Bubu offers her a walkie-talkie to use, she agrees to let him baby-sit her sick plant for her. But soon, Froga loses confidence in Bubu's ability to help.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Surprise) S1 (n°43)
programme.desc: «The Surprise»They decide to organise a surprise party on the hill. The organisation gets out of hand when Bubu's invitation cards fly away, Ron gets distracted in writing a heartfelt poem and Christopher tries to resist to eat the strawberry pie he baked.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Paperplane Race) S1 (n°44)
programme.desc: «The Paperplane Race»Everyone is bored today, so Bubu organises a paper plane race! Anna, Froga, Ron and Bubu need to create their own special paper planes. To everyone surprise, Froga and Bubu are still in the race.... Who will win?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Une nuit mouvementée) S4 (23/52)
programme.desc: «Une nuit mouvementée»Peppa's family are staying at Cousin Chloe's house. After a long day everyone is tired and wants to go to sleep. But baby Alexander's crying is keeping everyone awake!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le puits à souhaits) S4 (24/52)
programme.desc: «Le puits à souhaits»Granny Pig places a large order of plastic gnomes and a wishing well for the garden, Peppa and George love them but Grandpa Pig is not happy. He wishes they would all disappear!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête d'adieu de madame Gazelle) S4 (26/52)
programme.desc: «La fête d'adieu de madame Gazelle»Madame Gazelle announces that she is leaving the playgroup. The children are very sad to lose their favourite teacher, so they decide to throw her a leaving party.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La reine) S4 (27/52)
programme.desc: «La reine»La reine va remettre une récompense à mademoiselle Rabbit, la personne la plus travailleuse de tout le pays. Peppa et ses amis décident de l'accompagner.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Papa Pig, champion du monde) S3 (43/52)
programme.desc: «Papa Pig, champion du monde»Daddy Pig loses his title as Champion Puddle Jumper during the Daddi-Olympics, so everyone helps him train to win it back at the Daddi-Olympics.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le moulin à paroles) S3 (44/52)
programme.desc: «Le moulin à paroles»Peppa Pig talks far too much. Or at least so Suzy thinks. In response, Peppa decides that she is never going to talk, ever again. But this does not last for very long at all.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camion de Monsieur Fox) S3 (45/52)
programme.desc: «Le camion de Monsieur Fox»When Daddy Pig needs a new watch, Mr Fox finds three grandfather clocks in the back of his van. Three clocks are much better than one. Mr Fox has everything in his van - even a chicken!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (When I Grow Up) S1 (34/52)
programme.desc: «When I Grow Up»A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Les sept aliments / Un portrait au poil) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Les sept aliments / Un portrait au poil»The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Blaze et le génie de la lampe) S4 (18/20)
programme.desc: «Blaze et le génie de la lampe»Blaze and AJ are driving through the desert when they meet a magical Genie who loves to grant wishes! But when the Genie loses the jewels that give him his powers, Blaze and AJ go on a quest to get them back!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le Grand Défi des 100 Oeufs) S4 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Le Grand Défi des 100 Oeufs»A visit to the King's castle goes awry when the King accidentally catapults himself far, far away! To bring him home, Blaze, AJ and the King's adorable pet dragon Zeek must transform into knights in shining armor!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Attention, boules puantes ! / Les bébés autruches) S6 (6/26)
programme.desc: «Attention, boules puantes ! / Les bébés autruches»There is a strange smell by the swamp that chases all the animals away. Ostriches Oscar and Olivia are expecting chicks, but just before the eggs hatch, an eagle causes trouble.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La guitare de Gustavo / Yoga à la ferme) S6 (7/26)
programme.desc: «La guitare de Gustavo / Yoga à la ferme»Gustavo comes to play the guitar during the campfire concert. Mayor Humdinger also wants to give a concert and is looking for a way to make beautiful music. Yumi's baby goats enter the yoga class and this is how the idea of ??goat yoga arises.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La Tour de l'espace / C'est magique) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «La Tour de l'espace / C'est magique»Mr. Steel wants to go to the moon and orders Professor Sketch to turn the Steel Tower into a rocket! A magician lures the audience away from Rammy's presentation, who gets so angry that he takes it out on the man's hat.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Every Cloud) S2 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Every Cloud»Bobbi wants to spend time with Jade, but there are candy floss clouds to worry about first!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington & The Tooth Fairy / Paddington Goes to Work) S2 (12/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington & The Tooth Fairy / Paddington Goes to Work»Judy loses a tooth quite literally- Will it be found in time for bed and will the tooth fairy like marmalade? // Paddington becomes a work bear and helps Mr. Brown in the home office but learns computers can be tricky things.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddingtons New Neighbour / Paddington Makes the News) S2 (13/27)
programme.desc: «Paddingtons New Neighbour / Paddington Makes the News»The Browns have new neighbors & Toq is full of tales like there's a goblin in the garden and her dad is an astronaut! They can't be true, can they? // Paddington, Jonathan & Judy decide to create a newspaper but they need a front page story!

programme.desc: «Le cochon du milieu»Peppa loses her tooth, so she puts the tooth under the pillow for the Tooth Fairy, but she worries that she might be mean.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Papa Pig a perdu ses lunettes) S1 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Papa Pig a perdu ses lunettes»Papa Pig is a bit cranky because he lost his glasses. Peppa and George are going to look for him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le jardinage) S1 (10/52)
programme.desc: «Le jardinage»Daddy Loses His Glasses: When Daddy Pig loses his glasses he gets a bit grumpy. But Peppa and George have lots of fun looking for them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le hoquet) S1 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Le hoquet»George gets hiccups when he drinks his juice too quickly, so Peppa tries to cure him.

programme.desc: «Blue au pays des dinosaures»Blue's Dino Clues: It's a prehistoric game of Blue's Clues when a mysterious dinosaur egg falls out of the Skidoo Frame and starts to hatch! (S3, ep 2).

programme.desc: «Hiccup Soup»Follow the adventures of 8-year-old Santiago Montes, a brave and kind-hearted pirate, and features a Spanish-language and Latino-Caribbean culture curriculum.

programme.desc: «Amis pour la vie / La Poulpicelle»When Baby Shark and friends enter a battle of the bands, Baby's rivalry with Shadow gets heated.

programme.desc: «William Manta: News Fish»William Manta - News Fish: While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter. (S1, ep 18a).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Cranberry Cookies) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Cranberry Cookies»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le réveil du Géant-Panzé / L'oeuf de Galinetta) S6 (8/26)
programme.desc: «Le réveil du Géant-Panzé / L'oeuf de Galinetta»The Turbots are trapped somewhere in the jungle. They tried to call the Paw Patrol, but their phone cut out! // Chickaletta has laid an egg, but it's rolled away and is heading through town. The Paw Patrol has to catch it before it breaks.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Builds a Scarecrow) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Paddington Builds a Scarecrow»A brand new version of a most familiar bear! A heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La voiture de course de George) S4 (32/52)
programme.desc: «La voiture de course de George»It's a beautiful day, but Peppa, George, Daddy Pig, and Grandpa Pig are sitting inside watching racecar driving on television!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le petit bateau) S4 (33/52)
programme.desc: «Le petit bateau»The Little Boat: Daddy Pig is left behind when everyone takes Grampy Rabbit's little boat to the riverside picnic spot. Will someone remember him and save him some cake?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le Bac à Sable) S4 (34/52)
programme.desc: «Le Bac à Sable»Peppa and her friends are busy building a desert island in a sandpit. They are all very proud of it, with its forest, lake, houses, and shops.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Une rencontre mystérieuse) S1 (65/78)
programme.desc: «Une rencontre mystérieuse»Mysterious Visitor: Bubu is eager to meet a real space alien so he builds a homemade antenna and sound box to communicate with outer space. (S1, ep 65).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Squeaky Boots) S1 (n°66)
programme.desc: «The Squeaky Boots»The Squeaky Boots: Christopher leads the friends in a fun game of hide and seek, but Froga soon realizes that her new boots are letting out a noisy squeak! (S1, ep 66).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Les Barbapapa des cavernes / Les petits monstres) S1 (19/52)
programme.desc: «Les Barbapapa des cavernes / Les petits monstres»The barbababies discover a strange cave. Barbalib tells the story of the caves Barbapapa and how they transformed. // The Barbababies have a sleepover in the living room. Fearing the monsters in the closet, they set up wacky traps to catch them.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La fête des lumières avec Blue) S3 (4/18)
programme.desc: «La fête des lumières avec Blue»Everyone's at Periwinkle's house celebrating Hanukkah! Well, not everyone, exactly. There's a special guest coming to our party! Who could it be?

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le Défilé de ballons géants / La Tarentule des cavernes) S6 (16/26)
programme.desc: «Le Défilé de ballons géants / La Tarentule des cavernes»The Turbot cousins try to spot a rare spider, but get stuck in its web. It's up to the PAW Patrol save the spider spies!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Il faut sauver les abeilles / Le Canard Robot) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Il faut sauver les abeilles / Le Canard Robot»When the bees are in need, Bobbi takes action. Bees are important, and without them there are no flowers, no fruit, and no kaki flaps! Kai takes care of the ducklings but gets in trouble when he leaves that task to Robo-Duck.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Les Super Clones / Mise en boîte) S1 (11/20)
programme.desc: «Les Super Clones / Mise en boîte»In order to win the Citizen of the Year, Sir Steel and Professor Scratch create holograms doubles of Deer Squad who cause chaos all around. // It's Recycling Day and Sir Steel puts the whole town in cardboard boxes with his Box-ooka device.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Hatching Surprise / Paddington the Best Bear) S2 (26/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Hatching Surprise / Paddington the Best Bear»Paddington helps to hatch an egg but it takes ages & when it finally cracks open, he gets a real surprise! // Paddington wishes he could have been at Mr. & Mrs. Brown's wedding after seeing some photos, so they decide to do it all again!

programme.title: Mini Chef (Cranberry Cookies) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Cranberry Cookies»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Making Bread / From One Pit to Another) S1 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Making Bread / From One Pit to Another»Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned... // The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle) S1 (6/52)
programme.desc: «It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle»Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La Reine des farces / La citronnade du lagon) S1 (n°21)
programme.desc: «La Reine des farces / La citronnade du lagon»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Lagoon Lemonade) S1 (23/28)
programme.desc: «Lagoon Lemonade»Lagoon Lemonade: When a heatwave strikes, Baby and William supply the town with Grandpa's world famous Lemonade but instead of cutting lemons, they cut corners. (S1, ep 21b).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (La chaussette disparue) S1 (64/78)
programme.desc: «La chaussette disparue»When Froga realizes her socks are smelly after a day of gardening, Bubu offers to help by placing them into his Smell Better Machine.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Key) S1 (n°69)
programme.desc: «The Key»The Key: Because of her fear of spiders, Froga locks herself and Ron in the greenhouse to collecting Strawberries for the friends' Strawberry Snack time Musical Feast. (S1, ep 69).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Give-Away Day) S1 (45/78)
programme.desc: «Give-Away Day»Froga gets a new beautiful Sunflower Plant and decides to put it in her greenhouse. But she realizes that has been using her greenhouse to store all the items she doesn't know what to do with anymore. Now there's no room for her plant!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Funny Sounds) S1 (46/78)
programme.desc: «Funny Sounds»Silly Sounds: When he accidentally erases the 3 funny sounds that Christopher had on his recorder, Ron, decides to re-record them with the help of all his friends. (S1, ep 46).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Maître Christophe) S1 (47/78)
programme.desc: «Maître Christophe»Froga is so enamored with Super-Christopher, she decides that she wants to learn how to become Super-Froga! Christopher takes on the challenge of being her superhero instructor and after a rocky start, the two become terrific super partners.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (An Endless Story) S1 (n°48)
programme.desc: «An Endless Story»Anna is reading Christopher and Froga a story - but when she gets to the end, they discover the last two pages are missing! After a search for the missing pages, they find out that one of them is blank.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les jeux de plein air) S4 (42/52)
programme.desc: «Les jeux de plein air»Peppa et Suzy doivent jouer dehors mais elles s'ennuient. Papa Pig sort un carton de jeux d'extérieur, mais George est un peu trop petit pour les différentes activités...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (En bateau) S4 (43/52)
programme.desc: «En bateau»Going Boating: Everyone has come to the lake to go boating, and have a race.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le magasin de porcelaine) S4 (44/52)
programme.desc: «Le magasin de porcelaine»While enjoying a tea break, Mr Bull accidentally breaks his delicate teapot. He takes the pieces to Miss Rabbit in the hope that she can mend it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les fruits) S4 (45/52)
programme.desc: «Les fruits»Fruit: It is fruit day at the supermarket, and Miss Rabbit is making fruit smoothies.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les amis de Chloé) S3 (46/52)
programme.desc: «Les amis de Chloé»Peppa and George go to play with Cousin Chloe and her friends, but the older children don't want to play any "baby" games.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le cours de gymnastique) S3 (47/52)
programme.desc: «Le cours de gymnastique»Madame Gazelle emmène ses élèves au cours de gymnastique dispensé par papy Rabbit, où ils apprennent la souplesse et l'agilité...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le mûrier) S3 (48/52)
programme.desc: «Le mûrier»Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Cave Barbapapas) S1 (19/52)
programme.desc: «The Cave Barbapapas»The barbababies discover a strange cave. Barbalib tells the story of the caves Barbapapa and how they transformed.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'arbre de Barbapapa / L'anniversaire des barbabébés) S1 (1/52)
programme.desc: «L'arbre de Barbapapa / L'anniversaire des barbabébés»Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals. // It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La poursuite de minuit) S4 (20/20)
programme.desc: «La poursuite de minuit»It may be nighttime in Axle City, but all the trucks are staying up super late for the ultimate all-night race: the Midnight Mile! And the first truck to cross the finish line will win the Glow-in-the-Dark trophy!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (L'île au trésor perdu) S5 (1/20)
programme.desc: «L'île au trésor perdu»Somewhere, on The Island of Lost Treasure, there are incredible riches just waiting to be discovered. And Blaze and Darington are determined to be the first to find them!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat'Patrouille sauve les pirates / Drôles d'oiseaux) S6 (11/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat'Patrouille sauve les pirates / Drôles d'oiseaux»Pups Save the Land Pirates / Pups Save the Bird Watching Turbots.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Dans la peau de Galinetta / Le concours du meilleur athlète) S6 (13/26)
programme.desc: «Dans la peau de Galinetta / Le concours du meilleur athlète»Mayor Humdinger creates robotic Pants to cheat at the Most Amazing Athlete Contest. They go haywire so Pups have to save runaway Mayor.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Les Nuages de couleur / La grande course) S1 (12/20)
programme.desc: «Les Nuages de couleur / La grande course»Sir Steel is upset with Lola's sky art as it affects the popularity of his hat stand, so he tries to disperse her artwork. // The Deer Squad have a race to see whose cart is the fastest, but Sir Steel unexpectedly join in with his Steelmobile!
